Tutorial URL: http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?tut=install_on_mac&cat=install

Issues:

 - `dart` wasn't installed following the commands in the tutorial.

```
$ brew tap dartsim/dart
Warning: Already tapped!
$ brew install dartsim --core-only
Error: No available formula for dartsim 
==> Searching formulae...
dartsim/dart/dartsim3	    dartsim/dart/dartsim5	dartsim/dart/grip
dartsim/dart/dartsim4	    dartsim/dart/fcl
==> Searching taps...
```

Possible improvements:

 - Installation of Homebrew might break the libraries that are already built on your Mac. So I suggest adding a check if Homebrew is already installed or not, and only if it's not installed yet do the installation (though not sure since I'm no OSX expert).

 - I'm afraid this installation tutorial doesn't mention the possibility of overwriting "gazebo" command of the version that's already installed. 

Tested environment:

```
$ sw_vers -productVersion 
10.10.4
```
